snippet: Chief Justice Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhry is heading a three-justice panel investigating corruption allegations against his son.
abstract: Chief Justice Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhry of Pakistan, a strong-willed judge whose policy of unchecked judicial activism has targeted officials at the highest levels, finds himself in a notably awkward sport, investigating the actions of his own son; Arsalan Iftikhar Chaudhry, is suspected of corruption in taking bribes; critics call it clear case of conflict of interest, but justice insists he will uphold the law.
lead_paragraph: Chief Justice Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhry is heading a three-justice panel investigating corruption allegations against his son.

headline.seo: For Pakistan Chief Judge, Next Defendant Is His Son
headline.main: After Cabinet Officials, Next on the Docket for Pakistan’s Chief Justice Is His Son
headline.print_headline: After Cabinet Officials, Next on the Docket for Pakistan’s Chief Justice Is His Son
